title: Furnished and tiled bungalow for sale
location: Top Pass Nuwara Eliya, Nuwara Eliya
details:
2 Fully furnished and tiled apartments of a bungalow for sale in the Nuwara Eliya Sanasa Holiday Resort. 3.5 km away from Nuwara Eliya town. 2.5km away from Haggala gardens. 1.5km from Seethaeliya Kovil.
24 hours security and restaurant facilities are provided by the Sanasa Holiday resort.
Each apartment has 2 bedrooms, shower room, kitchen, dining room, and parking area reserved. The properties are located on top of a hill offering a breathtaking view of tea plantations.
The apartments are currently being used for commercial purposes. The apartments have an annual turnover of 0.6million rupees profit after tax and utilities. Selling due to personal relocation.

SHOWER ROOM: Fitted white tile with matching W/C and European style bidet, pedestal wash hand basin and shower with electric shower are all present and fully functioning. All toilet fittings and tiles have been imported from Italy.

KITCHEN: Modern kitchen with an array of eye level and base units finished in cream satinwood with an integrated electric oven and a half bowl sink and drainer.

DINING ROOM: glass dining table seating 6 people. Cupboards and pantry are fully integrated with the room

BEDROOMS: 1 bedroom has 2 single bed, whilst the other has a double bed and a single bed. Wardrobes and clothes hanging rails are included with the rooms.

EXTERNALLY: To the side of the property there is a large area providing parking for several cars. There is also pedestrian access to the back of the property into the kitchen.

For further information, I can be contacted on my personal phone or Srilankan number 0332260074. Price is negotiable.
